import React, { Component} from 'react' import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import {Modal, ModalBody, ModalFooter, ModalHeader} from 'reactstrap'; class ModalP extends Component{ state={ modalInsertar: false, } modalInsertar=()=>{ this.setState({modalInsertar: !this.state.modalInsertar}); } render(){ const {form}=this.state; return ( <>



this.modalInsertar()}>x



) } } export default ModalP;
